Perform collection and delivery duties, forklift driving and general stores duties

Location: Riverhorse Valley, Durban

Main Duties include:

-Daily vehicle checks, complete the vehicle checklist. Immediately report any major mechanical defects to your supervisor

-Collect /deliver all chemical and mechanical goods under the direction of the Logistics Assistant and Logistics Lead.

-Complete the mileage logbook daily

-Account for and reconcile all fuel slips, on a monthly basis.

-Will be responsible for Company cell phone allocated to you

-Drive and operate the forklift as per company procedures and standards, inclusive of road safety standards (loading) and materials handling standards.

-Assist in packing away of receipted stock into the dedicated stock locations, accurately and on time.

-Assist with daily picking of stock for dispatch/deliveries

Criteria:

-Grade 12 or assessed equivalent competence.

-Valid, unendorsed Driver’s license Code C (8 Ton truck)

-Public Driver’s Permit (Essential)

-Hazchem/dangerous goods Drivers Permit.

-5 – 10 Year’s experience in chemical or similar goods transport

-Full Medical Fitness Test Certificate.

-Physically able to perform all the above outcomes.

-Have the necessary people interaction skills
